meanings.sent1: I will rescreening the movie to make sure there are no errors.
meanings.sent2: The technician will rescreening the patient for any signs of illness.
meanings.sent3: The detective decided to rescreening the suspects for any missed clues.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was rescreening her life choices after the unexpected turn of events.
meanings.sent5: The teacher emphasized the importance of rescreening your work for mistakes.

meanings.sent1: The rescreening of the documents revealed new information.
meanings.sent2: We scheduled a rescreening of the employees for security purposes.
meanings.sent3: The rescreening of the movie made the audience realize they missed a key detail.
meanings.sent4: The rescreening of the play brought out hidden talents in the actors.
meanings.sent5: The rescreening of the painting highlighted intricate details previously unnoticed.
